column5: which had been a side you could order as one of your accompanying sides
column6: into a stand-alone non-side. As much as I loved sides like the fries (but who isn't at least capable of great fries in Chicago?)
column7: I would often get peach cobblers as both my sides. Now
column8: I never get the peach cobbler because I'm not going to pay extra for it
column9: and get more food than I want or need just to do so.
